mapper.insert: insert into lb_device_lampblack_data (create_time, remote_socket_address, mn, date_time, lampblack_speed, lampblack_temperature, lampblack_pressure, lampblack_humidity, lampblack_dp, ozone, ozone_concentration, nmhc, pm, lampblack, purification_device_a, purification_device_v, purification_device_status, purification_device_total_w, exhaust_fan_a, exhaust_fan_v,exhaust_fan_status,exhaust_fan_total_w) values ( NOW(), #{remoteSocketAddress}, #{mn}, STR_TO_DATE(${dateTime},'%Y%m%d%H%i%s%f'), #{lampblackSpeed}, #{lampblackTemperature}, #{lampblackPressure}, #{lampblackHumidity}, #{lampblackDP}, #{ozone}, #{ozoneConcentration}, #{nmhc}, #{pm}, #{lampblack}, #{purificationDeviceA}, #{purificationDeviceV}, #{purificationDeviceStatus}, #{purificationDeviceTotalW}, #{exhaustFanA}, #{exhaustFanV}, #{exhaustFanStatus}, #{exhaustFanTotalW} )
